sql.query: UPDATE publications as p SET url_path = ( SELECT ps.setting_value FROM publication_settings as ps WHERE ps.publication_id = p.publication_id AND ps.setting_name = 'pub-id::publisher-id' )
UPDATE issues as i SET url_path = ( SELECT SUBSTR(ist.setting_value, 1, 64) FROM issue_settings as ist WHERE ist.issue_id = i.issue_id AND ist.setting_name = 'pub-id::publisher-id' )

UPDATE issue_galleys as ig SET url_path = ( SELECT SUBSTR(igs.setting_value, 1, 64) FROM issue_galley_settings as igs WHERE igs.galley_id = ig.galley_id AND igs.setting_name = 'pub-id::publisher-id' )

UPDATE publication_galleys as g SET url_path = ( SELECT SUBSTR(gs.setting_value, 1, 64) FROM publication_galley_settings as gs WHERE gs.galley_id = g.galley_id AND gs.setting_name = 'pub-id::publisher-id' )
